did.head: Collection Summary
did.abstract: Correspondence concerning a state-wide fund raising effort to pay for a silver service to present to the Battleship Arizona. Correspondents include Thomas E. Campbell, Allen T. Bird, and William A. Clark. Also includes lists of contributors and their contributions.
